# lavinmq_shovels (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "lavinmq_shovels" "all" {
  vhost = "/"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `vhost` (String) The vhost to list shovels from. If not specified, lists all shovels.

### Read-Only

- `shovels` (Attributes List) List of shovels. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--shovels))

<a id="nestedatt--shovels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `shovels`

Read-Only:

- `ack_mode` (String) Acknowledgement mode.
- `dest_exchange` (String) Destination exchange name.
- `dest_exchange_key` (String) Destination exchange routing key.
- `dest_queue` (String) Destination queue name.
- `dest_uri` (String) Destination AMQP URI.
- `name` (String) Name of the shovel.
- `reconnect_delay` (Number) Reconnect delay in seconds.
- `src_delete_after` (String) When to delete messages from source.
- `src_exchange` (String) Source exchange name.
- `src_exchange_key` (String) Source exchange routing key.
- `src_prefetch_count` (Number) Source prefetch count.
- `src_queue` (String) Source queue name.
- `src_uri` (String) Source AMQP URI.
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the shovel is defined.
